recoveryCenter.title: Recovery Center
recoveryCenter.meaningLine1: In military terminology, the code '4.5.0.' signifies 'ALL IS QUIET'.
recoveryCenter.meaningLine2: This name conveys the fundamental reassurance that individuals in need of help and medical intervention seek to hear – RELAX – EVERYTHING WILL BE FINE!
recoveryCenter.number5Text: It is depicted as an upward arrow, symbolizing that at the center, visitors are assisted in rising, solving problems, feeling uplifted, and experiencing growth in strength and possibilities.
recoveryCenter.number0Text: It is associated with a survey icon, signifying that each visitor has their own history, unique characteristics, medical aspects, preferences, wishes, and possibly certain taboos.
recoveryCenter.projectIdeaText: A center for comprehensive health restoration, psychological well-being, and further self-realization of military personnel and individuals affected by war.
recoveryCenter.assistanceTitle: Multidisciplinary rehabilitation assistance includes work with:
recoveryCenter.goalText1: is to make the Center a place where the patients feel safe, convenient, calm, and confident at every point of contact with the Center.
recoveryCenter.goalText2: We aim for it to be a center with powerful experts who don't waste time and take on the most challenging tasks to ensure a comfortable environment inside.
recoveryCenter.goalCard: CENTER IS CREATED BY PEOPLE FOR PEOPLE!
recoveryCenter.infra2: Estimated patient flow per year – 2400; Outpatient – 650
recoveryCenter.infra3: Total area of the Center – 5460 sq.m.
recoveryCenter.mohText: is a part of the network of modern Ministry of Health Centers across regions in Ukraine.

craftProducts.title: Craft Products of Zakarpattia
craftProducts.introText1: Zakarpattia is a region full of natural beauty and rich traditions, famous for its unique craft products.
craftProducts.introText2: Thanks to its favorable location, producers offer a wide range of local goods, including wines, cheeses, honey, and more.
craftProducts.introText3: Explore the taste of Zakarpattia and enjoy the diverse culinary history of the region.
craftProducts.introText4: Here, you can find everything from wine to jams, cheese to syrups.
craftProducts.wineDescription: The wine from Zakarpattia is famous for its unique taste and rich aroma, crafted by local winemakers from the best vineyards.
craftProducts.cheeseDescription: Zakarpattian cheese is made using centuries-old techniques, offering unique textures and flavors.
craftProducts.honeyDescription: Zakarpattian honey is produced by local beekeepers using the purest natural ingredients, offering a range of sweet flavors.
craftProducts.syrupDescription: The syrups made from local fruits and herbs offer a delicious taste of Zakarpattia's nature.
craftProducts.jamsDescription: Traditional Zakarpattian jams are made from fresh, locally sourced fruits and berries.
craftProducts.mineralWaterDescription: Zakarpattia is home to some of the best mineral springs, offering healing waters from the heart of the mountains.
